column4: hi , I am using AMD athlon 64. I have installed ubuntu 10.04. How do I find the chipset details and install the appropriate drivers as the laptop gets heated upto 90 c
i think dmidecode will help you find relevant info
Yeah I found, thank you. But suggest me, do I need to install the drivers for acer 5536 AMD processor (ubuntu)
if it's running at 90 i think you should take a look at your heat sink first
